title: Growth Expert
description:
- Choosing in accordance with the other departments which metrics to focus on.
- Bringing traditional and creative ideas how to grow those metrics
- A/B testing those ideas.
- Analyzing the data and users’ feedback.
- Exchanging ideas/data/feedback with other departments (Product, marketing, top management) in order to present results and make the product more user-centric.
- Driving traffic to your website, landing pages, social media, apps…
- Understanding conversion rate optimization (CRO) principles and hacks and being able to apply CRO hacks to any businesses.
- Working on a lean startup process.
- Working with the AARRR Sales Metrics Diagram (Acquisition – Activation – Retention – Referral - Revenue)
- Prioritizing growth channels.
- Optimizing channels in order to always improve the performance of ones business.
- Scaling and Automating the growth processes.
- Knowledgeable about referral marketing and being able to create viral growth.
requirements:
- 2-4 years experience in a customer facing or growth (strategy) role
- Interest in understanding and impacting various growth levers 
- Ability to improvise, think creatively, and be an enthusiastic problem solver
- Experience coming up with creative and unorthodox ideas to engage prospects
- Analytical and data-driven with an openness to change course as needed based on consistent measurement and tracking
- Curious by nature and excited by emerging and existing relevant technologies. You are an avid learner.
- A mindset of improving what already works while trying out new ideas and recovering quickly from the small failures
- Ability to deal with ambiguity in a fast-paced startup environment
- Good English
